Question: This person was a contestant on the tenth season of Dancing with the Stars, partnered with professional dancer Damian Whitewood.
Hints: In early 2004, this person returned to the spotlight.
In September 1998, this person starred as Vallery Irons in the Sony Pictures Entertainment syndicated show V.I.P.
For a time, she was known as this person Lee (or Pamela Lee) after marrying Mötley Crüe drummer Tommy Lee.
